feed.title: Track Typedb Awesome Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome TypeDB frameworks libraries, software and resources.

entry.title: Typedb Awesome Updates on Oct 16 - Oct 22, 2023
entry.content:
Open source projects using TypeDB

  • Blitz-ORM - Blitz-ORM is an Object Relational Mapper written in TypeScript and compatible with TypeDB.
  • TypeDB-ML - TypeDB-ML provides tools to enable graph algorithms and machine learning with TypeDB.
  • TypeDB Loader - An open-source data migrator for loading data into TypeDB at scale.

Conferences

  • Orbit

Documentation

  • TypeDB Documentation Portal

Example projects

  • TypeDB Driver Examples - This repository includes examples that showcase usage of TypeDB Drivers in reading from and writing to a TypeDB database.

Blog posts

  • The need for subtyping and polymorphism in databases
  • Accelerating drug discovery with applied knowledge engineering and TypeDB
  • Modeling collections in databases: Relational/SQL vs TypeDB
  • The age of AI is upon us - where are the smart databases?
  • Building a Cyber Threat Intelligence database with TypeDB
  • Inheritance and polymorphism: where the cracks in SQL begin to show
  • Identity and access management with TypeDB: Part I, polymorphism
  • A New Era for TypeDB
  • Inference in TypeDB

Videos

  • TypeDB 2.0: A Database Evolution
  • Building an Open Source Threat Intelligence Platform with STIX
  • TypeDB Community Project - NodeLab: An Advanced TypeDB GUI
  • Pandora Paper Leaks with TypeDB

Client Drivers (official)

  • Rust, Python, Java, Node.js and C

Client Drivers (community)

  • Julia

IDE and editor support

  • Emacs - TypeQL Plugin
  • Visual Studio Code - TypeQL Plugin
  • JetBrains / IntelliJ - TypeQL Plugin

Community

  • Discussion Forum
  • Discord
  • Stack Overflow
  • Meetup
  • Twitter
  • YouTube
  • LinkedIn
  • Blog
entry.summary: 32 awesome projects updated on Oct 16 - Oct 22, 2023

entry.title: Typedb Awesome Updates on Jul 25 - Jul 31, 2022
entry.content:
Open source projects using TypeDB

  • TypeDB Studio - IDE for TypeDB - TypeDB Studio is an Integrated Development Environment for TypeDB for performing knowledge engineering.
  • TypeDB OSI - Cyber Threat Intelligence - TypeDB CTI is an open source threat intelligence platform enabling threat intel professionals to bring together their disparate CTI information into one database and find new insights about cyber threats.
  • TypeDB OSI - Biomedical Knowledge Graph - TypeDB Bio is an open source biomedical knowledge graph providing biomedical researchers an intuitive way to query interconnected and heterogeneous biomedical data in one single place.

Videos

  • Introduction to TypeDB and TypeQL
  • Building a Distributed Database With the Raft Replication Algorithm
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Jul 25 - Jul 31, 2022

entry.title: Typedb Awesome Updates on Jan 25 - Jan 31, 2021
entry.content:
Open source projects using TypeDB

  • Source++ - Open-source automated programming assistant with runtime-aware and context-aware functionality.
  • Rasa - Open-source machine learning framework to automate text-and voice-based conversations.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jan 25 - Jan 31, 2021
